== Main Inclusion Report for python-ltsp ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/p/python-ltsp, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Part of ltsp-management-gui spec, provides backend functions for ltsp server maintenance
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=python-ltsp|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No recent entries in <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=python-ltsp|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Not in debian (ubuntu is upstream)
** Active <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/python-ltsp|upstream]]</nowiki>.
** No critical bugs <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/python-ltsp/+bugs|upstream]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
